Description_lang: Transforms the enemy into a sheep, wandering around incapacitated for $d. While affected, the victim cannot take actions but will regenerate health very quickly. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.$?s56382[ When critters are affected, can affect multiple targets, and has a duration of 1 day.][]
AuraDescription_lang: Incapacitated. Cannot attack or cast spells.  Increased health regeneration.
